metadata.synopsis: Astarion and Minthara see Last Light, fallen into shadow

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: Devoured by the darkness. They should have retreated while they had the chance.
0.context: NodeContext: witnessing Last Light, fallen into darkness, the Harpers all taken. She's chilled, but not at all sad. She didn't like them

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: And yet here we stand. We're either very clever or very lucky.

2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
2.text: You do not need luck to survive, Astarion. Not when you have me.
2.context: NodeContext: Proud and a little bit condescending
